data.title: Your Lotus Cars dealer in Antwerp/Kontich
data.meta_description: Since 1985 LotusAntwerp has been the premier Lotus partner in Belgium. Visit our showroom with a selection of new and used Lotus vehicles.
data.text:
Since 1985 Lotus Antwerp has been the premier Lotus partner in Belgium. Our company is situated in Kontich, between Antwerp and Brussels to serve the Lotus community even better.

We have a well stocked showroom with a broad selection of new, used and classic Lotus vehicles. We look forward to your visit where we can discuss your desires and requirements in finding your dream car. The full range of Lotus cars and our current stock are presented on this website and should give you a good overview of what we can offer you. Looking for something not listed? Please get in touch with us.

Furthermore our dealership also consists of a fully equipped workshop with experienced and Lotus trained mechanics where we can service your vehicle. Is so desired we can also upgrade components with approved Lotus aftermarket parts making your car even more suitable for road, track or race use.

Please have a look in our virtual showroom but we also look forward to seeing you in person. We speak Dutch, French, English and German
